MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / LEE / DEPP





(McGowan looks up at beam and dives, =
rolling out of the way of the beam. She looks at Zero and fires 2 missiles =
at him.)



(Barrymore backflips away from the beam and fires 6 laser beams=
 at Zero.)



(Lee runs out of the way and fires 2 fireballs at Zero.)



(=
Depp is hit by the beam but it doesn't do anything to him since he was orig=
inally a maximal. He ignores it, walking out of the beam and continues to a=
pproach Nightlight...)
